attributes.action: Add veganism to the national curriculum and require schools offer vegan meals
attributes.additional_details:
A Vegan diet is known to be good for the health and the environment. I strongly believe that children should be taught how food is produced and how its ends up on the plate this allows personal choice.
 
I believe this would be very beneficial in the education sector as students should be given a insight of where food comes from. Also I feel they should be given facts on the benefits a vegan diet has to health.
attributes.background: Veganism should be added to the national curriculum so that children learn about veganism. I also believe that every, school, college or university should have vegan options so students are given a choice.
